trans-unit.source: Represents the Uri section within a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 表示配置文件中的 Uri 部分。

trans-unit.source: The existing <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> class has been extended to provide support for International Resource Identifiers (IRI) and Internationalized Domain Names.
trans-unit.target: 现有<xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>类已进行了扩展，以提供针对国际资源标识符 (IRI) 和国际化域名的支持。</xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Current users will not see any change from the .NET Framework 2.0 behavior unless they specifically enable IRI and IDN.
trans-unit.target: 除非专门允许 IRI 和 IDN，当前用户看不到从.NET Framework 2.0 行为进行任何更改。

trans-unit.source: This ensures application compatibility with prior versions of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 这可确保与以前版本的.NET Framework 的应用程序兼容性。

trans-unit.source: The configuration settings for IRI and IDN can be retrieved using the UriSection class.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 UriSection 类检索 IRI 和 IDN 的配置设置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.UriSection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Configuration.UriSection"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The existing <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> class has been extended to provide support for International Resource Identifiers (IRI) and Internationalized Domain Names.
trans-unit.target: 现有<xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>类已进行了扩展，以提供针对国际资源标识符 (IRI) 和国际化域名的支持。</xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Current users will not see any change from the .NET Framework 2.0 behavior unless they specifically enable IRI and IDN.
trans-unit.target: 除非专门允许 IRI 和 IDN，当前用户看不到从.NET Framework 2.0 行为进行任何更改。

trans-unit.source: This ensures application compatibility with prior versions of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 这可确保与以前版本的.NET Framework 的应用程序兼容性。

trans-unit.source: The configuration settings for IRI and IDN can be retrieved using the <xref:System.Configuration.UriSection> class.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用<xref:System.Configuration.UriSection>类</xref:System.Configuration.UriSection>检索 IRI 和 IDN 的配置设置

trans-unit.source: For more information on IRI support, see the Remarks section for the <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> class.
trans-unit.target: IRI 支持的详细信息，请参阅备注部分的<xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>类。</xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Configuration.IdnElement"></xref> object that contains the configuration setting for International Domain Name (IDN) processing in the <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Configuration.IdnElement"></xref>对象，其中包含的配置设置的国际域名 (IDN) 处理中<xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>类。

trans-unit.source: The existing <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> class has been extended to provide support for International Resource Identifiers (IRI) and Internationalized Domain Names.
trans-unit.target: 现有<xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>类已进行了扩展，以提供针对国际资源标识符 (IRI) 和国际化域名的支持。</xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Current users will not see any change from the .NET Framework 2.0 behavior unless they specifically enable IRI and IDN.
trans-unit.target: 除非专门允许 IRI 和 IDN，当前用户看不到从.NET Framework 2.0 行为进行任何更改。

trans-unit.source: This ensures application compatibility with prior versions of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 这可确保与以前版本的.NET Framework 的应用程序兼容性。

trans-unit.source: The configuration settings for IRI and IDN can be retrieved using the <xref:System.Configuration.UriSection> class.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用<xref:System.Configuration.UriSection>类</xref:System.Configuration.UriSection>检索 IRI 和 IDN 的配置设置

trans-unit.source: The Idn property returns the configuration setting for IDN processing in the <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> class.
trans-unit.target: Idn 属性返回 IDN 配置设置在<xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>类</xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>中处理

trans-unit.source: IRI processing must be enabled for IDN processing to be possible.
trans-unit.target: 必须为 IDN 处理为可能启用 IRI 处理。

trans-unit.source: If IRI processing is disabled, then IDN processing will be set to the default setting where the .NET Framework 2.0 behavior is used for compatibility and IDN names are not used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IRI 处理处于禁用状态，则 IDN 处理将设置为其中的.NET Framework 2.0 行为用于实现兼容性和不使用 IDN 名称的默认设置。

trans-unit.source: The Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) attribute only controls IDN processing.
trans-unit.target: 国际化域名 (IDN) 属性仅控制 IDN 处理。

trans-unit.source: All other IRI processing (character normalization, for example) is performed by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下执行所有其他 IRI 处理 （例如字符规范化）。

trans-unit.source: The configuration setting for the <xref:System.Configuration.IdnElement> will be read once when the first <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> class is constructed.
trans-unit.target: 配置设置<xref:System.Configuration.IdnElement>将能读取一次当第一个<xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>类构造。</xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Configuration.IdnElement>

trans-unit.source: Changes to configuration settings after that time are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 将忽略在此时间之后的配置设置的更改。

trans-unit.source: For more information on IRI support, see the Remarks section for the <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> class.
trans-unit.target: IRI 支持的详细信息，请参阅备注部分的<xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>类。</xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The configuration setting for International Domain Name (IDN) processing in the <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> class.
trans-unit.target: 配置设置的国际域名 (IDN) 处理中<xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Configuration.IriParsingElement"></xref> object that contains the configuration setting for International Resource Identifiers (IRI) parsing in the <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Configuration.IriParsingElement"></xref>对象，其中包含的国际资源标识符 (IRI) 分析中的配置设置<xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>类。

trans-unit.source: The existing <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> class has been extended to provide support for International Resource Identifiers (IRI) and Internationalized Domain Names.
trans-unit.target: 现有<xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>类已进行了扩展，以提供针对国际资源标识符 (IRI) 和国际化域名的支持。</xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Current users will not see any change from the .NET Framework 2.0 behavior unless they specifically enable IRI and IDN.
trans-unit.target: 除非专门允许 IRI 和 IDN，当前用户看不到从.NET Framework 2.0 行为进行任何更改。

trans-unit.source: This ensures application compatibility with prior versions of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 这可确保与以前版本的.NET Framework 的应用程序兼容性。

trans-unit.source: The configuration settings for IRI and IDN can be retrieved using the <xref:System.Configuration.UriSection> class.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用<xref:System.Configuration.UriSection>类</xref:System.Configuration.UriSection>检索 IRI 和 IDN 的配置设置

trans-unit.source: The IriParsing property returns the configuration setting for IRI parsing in the <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> class.
trans-unit.target: IriParsing 属性返回 IRI 分析在<xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>类</xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>中的配置的设置

trans-unit.source: IRI processing must be enabled for IDN processing to be possible.
trans-unit.target: 必须为 IDN 处理为可能启用 IRI 处理。

trans-unit.source: If IRI processing is disabled, then IDN processing will be set to the default setting where the .NET Framework 2.0 behavior is used for compatibility and IDN names are not used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IRI 处理处于禁用状态，则 IDN 处理将设置为其中的.NET Framework 2.0 行为用于实现兼容性和不使用 IDN 名称的默认设置。

trans-unit.source: The Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) attribute only controls IDN processing.
trans-unit.target: 国际化域名 (IDN) 属性仅控制 IDN 处理。

trans-unit.source: All other IRI processing (character normalization, for example) is performed by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下执行所有其他 IRI 处理 （例如字符规范化）。

trans-unit.source: The configuration setting for the <xref:System.Configuration.IriParsingElement> will be read once when the first <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> class is constructed.
trans-unit.target: 配置设置<xref:System.Configuration.IriParsingElement>将能读取一次当第一个<xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>类构造。</xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Configuration.IriParsingElement>

trans-unit.source: Changes to configuration settings after that time are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 将忽略在此时间之后的配置设置的更改。

trans-unit.source: For more information on IRI support, see the Remarks section for the <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> class.
trans-unit.target: IRI 支持的详细信息，请参阅备注部分的<xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>类。</xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The configuration setting for International Resource Identifiers (IRI) parsing in the <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> class.
trans-unit.target: 国际资源标识符 (IRI) 分析中的配置设置<xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>类。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElementCollection"></xref> object that contains the configuration settings for scheme parsing in the <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElementCollection"></xref>对象，其中包含在分析的方案的配置设置<xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>类。

trans-unit.source: The SchemeSettings property is not generic.
trans-unit.target: SchemeSettings 属性不是泛型的。

trans-unit.source: Only the genericUriParserOptions="DontUnescapePathDotsAndSlashes" configuration setting for HTTP and HTTPS schemes are supported.
trans-unit.target: 仅 genericUriParserOptions ="DontUnescapePathDotsAndSlashes"配置设置的 HTTP 和 HTTPS 方案受支持。

trans-unit.source: All other settings are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 将忽略所有其他设置。

trans-unit.source: The configuration settings for scheme parsing in the <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> class
trans-unit.target: 在分析的方案的配置设置<xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>类
